title: Had vs Did
description: Had или Did? Выбираем правильный вспомогательный глагол в инверсии.

tasks.question: ___ I known about the delay, I would have left earlier.
tasks.explanation: Had I known = If I had known. Условная инверсия с Past Perfect → результат с would have.

tasks.question: Never ___ I expect such generosity from a complete stranger.
tasks.explanation: Never did I expect — инверсия с отрицательным наречием в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ she realized the consequences, she would never have agreed.
tasks.explanation: Had she realized = If she had realized. Условная инверсия с Past Perfect.

tasks.question: Not once ___ he mention the issue during the entire meeting.
tasks.explanation: Not once did he mention — инверсия с отрицательным наречием Not once. Past Simple → did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ we left five minutes earlier, we would have caught the train.
tasks.explanation: Had we left = If we had left. Условная инверсия, результат с would have.

tasks.question: Rarely ___ the committee reach a unanimous decision on such matters.
tasks.explanation: Rarely did the committee reach — инверсия с Rarely в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the CEO stepped down sooner, the company might have survived.
tasks.explanation: Had the CEO stepped down = If the CEO had stepped down. Условная инверсия с Past Perfect.

tasks.question: Little ___ they know what challenges lay ahead of them.
tasks.explanation: Little did they know — устойчивая инверсия с Little в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ it not been for your help, we would have failed the project.
tasks.explanation: Had it not been for = If it hadn't been for. Условная инверсия: «Если бы не твоя помощь...»

tasks.question: Not only ___ she apologize, but she also offered to pay for damages.
tasks.explanation: Not only did she apologize — инверсия с Not only в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the investors been more cautious, the losses would have been minimal.
tasks.explanation: Had the investors been = If the investors had been. Условная инверсия с Past Perfect.

tasks.question: Seldom ___ we encounter such a complex regulatory problem.
tasks.explanation: Seldom did we encounter — инверсия с Seldom в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ they anticipated the market crash, they could have hedged their positions.
tasks.explanation: Had they anticipated = If they had anticipated. Условная инверсия с could have.

tasks.question: At no point ___ the defendant show any remorse during the trial.
tasks.explanation: At no point did the defendant show — инверсия с At no point в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ I been in your position, I would have handled things differently.
tasks.explanation: Had I been = If I had been. Условная инверсия: «Будь я на твоём месте...»

tasks.question: Under no circumstances ___ the manager approve the unauthorized expenses.
tasks.explanation: Under no circumstances did — инверсия с отрицательной фразой в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the doctor arrived sooner, the patient might have had a better outcome.
tasks.explanation: Had the doctor arrived = If the doctor had arrived. Условная инверсия с might have.

tasks.question: Hardly ___ anyone notice the subtle change in the company's policy.
tasks.explanation: Hardly did anyone notice — инверсия с Hardly в значении «едва ли кто-то». Past Simple → did.

tasks.question: ___ we not intervened at that critical moment, the situation would have escalated.
tasks.explanation: Had we not intervened = If we hadn't intervened. Условная инверсия с отрицанием.

tasks.question: In no way ___ his comments reflect the official position of the organization.
tasks.explanation: In no way did his comments reflect — инверсия с In no way в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the committee reviewed the data more thoroughly, the error would have been caught.
tasks.explanation: Had the committee reviewed = If the committee had reviewed. Условная инверсия с Past Perfect.

tasks.question: Only after the investigation ___ the full extent of the damage become clear.
tasks.explanation: Only after... did — инверсия с Only after в Past Simple. Did + infinitive (become).

tasks.question: ___ she been offered a better salary, she would still be with the firm.
tasks.explanation: Had she been offered = If she had been offered. Условная инверсия → результат в настоящем (would still be).

tasks.question: Not until the results were published ___ the public understand the severity.
tasks.explanation: Not until... did the public understand — инверсия с Not until в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ management acted on the warnings, the crisis could have been averted.
tasks.explanation: Had management acted = If management had acted. Условная инверсия с could have been.

tasks.question: Nowhere ___ the report mention the environmental impact of the project.
tasks.explanation: Nowhere did the report mention — инверсия с Nowhere в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the plane not been diverted, the passengers would have arrived on schedule.
tasks.explanation: Had the plane not been diverted = If the plane hadn't been diverted. Пассивная условная инверсия.

tasks.question: Only when she left ___ he realize how much she had meant to him.
tasks.explanation: Only when... did he realize — инверсия с Only when в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.

tasks.question: ___ the evidence been presented earlier, the verdict might have been different.
tasks.explanation: Had the evidence been presented = If the evidence had been presented. Условная инверсия (пассив).

tasks.question: Never before ___ the country face such a profound constitutional crisis.
tasks.explanation: Never before did the country face — инверсия с Never before в Past Simple. Did + infinitive.
